title: Spartacus: Gods of the Arena
fullTitle: Spartacus: Gods of the Arena (TV Series 2011â€“2011)

episodes.title: Past Transgressions
episodes.plot: Young Batiatus finds himself in control of his father's gladiator school. He uses his best fighter to win favor with a cunning nobleman behind the building of the new arena.

episodes.title: Missio
episodes.plot: Batiatus conjures up a devious plan and enlists Lucretia, Gaia and a clutch of gladiator recruits to see it through. Oenomaus longs to reclaim the top gladiator rank, but new challenges cross his path.

episodes.title: Paterfamilias
episodes.plot: Just as his fortunes are on the rise and his future clear, Batiatus is stunned by the return of his father - putting his attempts to gain rank by exploiting those above his class at risk.

episodes.title: Beneath the Mask
episodes.plot: The House of Batiatus is caught in the power struggle between father and son. Lucretia reluctantly agrees to her husband's risky plan. Gannicus finds himself on unstable ground.

episodes.title: Reckoning
episodes.plot: Batiatus's father announces a tournament to determine the worth of his stable of gladiators. Crixus, dedicated to proving himself, is drawn into the power play within the house.

episodes.title: The Bitter End
episodes.plot: Batiatus seeks vengeance for all that has befallen him, retaining his gladiators and Solonius in the cause. The new arena opens, promising a spectacle of combat and blood.
